description: [version 0.05] It works, but the user interface could use polishing, and quite a bit of basic functionality is missing: can't customize the display, can't send direct messages, can't send files...
There are a few things that can be improved but over all this is the best client.
summary: I love the way it looks

description: It works for a channel that I usually chat. I am familiar with UI/UX. Cons are that (1) I cannot spell and pronounce the name "Quaternion", and (2) encryption did not work yet.
Unfortunately for me it crashed after about 5 seconds. I'd give It only one star, but Discover does not allow me (another bug? :D). I promise I'll be checking next releases!
Used it on other distros, I think it's a great small Matrix client
